Class UtilMethods

java.lang.Object
ie.atu.sw.UtilMethods
public class UtilMethods extends Object
Utility class providing helper methods for string manipulation, error message handling, and conversion of strings to numbers. This class is designed for general-purpose use within other classes and contains static methods that can be accessed directly.
